t: DREW BARRYMORE ENTERS LIFESTYLE WITH ‘DEAR DREW’ FOR AMAZON - COSMETIC EXECUTIVE WOMEN
s: September 13, 2022 - Following in the footsteps of multi-hyphenate stars such as Gwyneth Paltrow, Reese Witherspoon and Blake Lively, Drew Barrymore has launched a lifestyle brand in collaboration with Amazon Fashion. The range, called Dear Drew, includes fashion pieces, as well as heated hair tools.

t: DREW BARRYMORE LAUNCHES LIFESTYLE BRAND ON AMAZON FASHION
s: October 23, 2017 - Drew Barrymore today launches a contemporary lifestyle brand called Dear Drew on Amazon Fashion. Described as “a love letter to women around the world,” the collection includes apparel, handbags, jewelry, luggage, hair tools, lingerie and loungewear, priced from $28 to $248. In the first campaign image, Barrymore wears the Mulberry Street tie-front skirt, SoHo fan drop earrings, Little Italy identification bracelet, NoLIta cuff and You are Strong clutch. While the items are clearly inspired by ...
